unnormalised: Entertainment News: Is Ranbir Kapoor *really* moving out?
normalised: Entertainment News: Is Ranbir Kapoor really moving out?

unnormalised: Okay, folks, grab your chai and samosas! The Bollywood grapevine is buzzing louder than a Diwali fireworks display! Rumours are flying thick and fast that Ranbir Kapoor is planning a *separate* pad. Apparently, things have been a tad tense in the Kapoor household since, well, forever?
normalised: Okay, folks, grab your chai and samosas! The Bollywood grapevine is buzzing louder than a Diwali fireworks display! Rumours are flying thick and fast that Ranbir Kapoor is planning a separate pad. Apparently, things have been a tad tense in the Kapoor household since, well, forever?

unnormalised: Sources close to the family – and by sources, we mean that guy outside Prithvi Theatre who knows everyone – say Neetu Kapoor wants Ranbir to stay closer to home, especially after Rishi Kapoor's passing on 30/04/2020. Alia, bless her heart, is trying to balance things, but Delhi is still far away even if she frequently travels.
normalised: Sources close to the family – and by sources, we mean that guy outside Prithvi Theatre who knows everyone – say Neetu Kapoor wants Ranbir to stay closer to home, especially after Rishi Kapoor's passing on thirtieth April two thousand and twenty. Alia, bless her heart, is trying to balance things, but Delhi is still far away even if she frequently travels.

unnormalised: Meanwhile, rumours suggest a swanky new apartment in Bandra is in the works. Someone spotted Ranbir at 14:30 hrs on 22/07/2024 checking out a property. Coincidence? We think not! He's also been suspiciously quiet on social media since 10/08/2024, which is practically an eternity in Bollywood time. Is this the end of the family nest? Stay tuned for more updates, and keep those conspiracy theories coming! We'll keep you posted. After all, who doesn't love a little filmy drama?
normalised: Meanwhile, rumours suggest a swanky new apartment in Bandra is in the works. Someone spotted Ranbir at fourteen thirty hours on twenty second July two thousand and twenty four checking out a property. Coincidence? We think not! He's also been suspiciously quiet on social media since tenth August two thousand and twenty four, which is practically an eternity in Bollywood time. Is this the end of the family nest? Stay tuned for more updates, and keep those conspiracy theories coming! We'll keep you posted. After all, who doesn't love a little filmy drama?
